title: New on HBO: September 2019
text:
Each month, several films and TV shows are added to HBO's schedule; we recommend the titles worth watching. For more streaming guides and HBO picks, head to Vulture’s What to Stream hub. James Franco in The Deuce. Photo: HBO

This Month’s Highlights

The Deuce, season three

The acclaimed David Simon series returns, and this time it’s the ’80s — the eve of 1985, to be exact. The new era brings plenty of new questions for our Times Square anti-heroes: Will home video ruin the porn industry? How will the sex trade respond to the AIDS epidemic? And will the arrival of the new Marriott Marquis hotel — complete with a revolving rooftop restaurant! — finally clean up the neighborhood? Season three should be a doozy.

description: Every month, HBO adds new movies and TV shows to its library. Our picks for September 2019 include The Hurt Locker, Mary Queen of Scots, The Deuce season three, and more.
